name: CARE High School - Bayview
description: Supports truant High School Students (9-12) who are struggling in school an alternative to traditional high school by providing them the opportunity to earn a high school diploma or GED, alongside additional access to student advocacy, career exploration, case management, and support referrals.
fullDescription: Supports truant High School Students (9-12) who are struggling in school an alternative to traditional high school by providing them the opportunity to earn a high school diploma or GED, alongside additional access to student advocacy, career exploration, case management, and support referrals.
whatTheyOffer: Supports truant High School Students (9-12) who are struggling in school an alternative to traditional high school by providing them the opportunity to earn a high school diploma or GED, alongside additional access to student advocacy, career exploration, case management, and support referrals.
howToGetIt: For more information contact: Ddurham@ymcasf.org or phone (415) 820-4232 Visit https://www.sfusd.edu/school/care-bayview
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Bayview Hunters Point
